content: I'll just respond to the last part of your question. I've tried troubleshooting the issue, but I haven't been able to pinpoint the exact cause. I've updated my drivers, run disk cleanups, and checked for overheating, but the bluescreens persist. I think it's time to replace the graphics card, as I've been putting it off for too long. Speaking of maintenance, I've been meaning to get a new wireless mouse, my current one is a bit worn out and the scroll wheel is stuck sometimes. I saw a gaming mouse on Newegg for $60, it has a 12,000 DPI optical sensor and customizable buttons, which is what I'm looking for. Do you think it's a good deal?
